column1: Sick or premature newborns may be given TPN before starting other feedings.
TPN delivers a mixture of fluid, electrolytes, sugars, amino acids (protein), vitamins, minerals, and often lipids (fats) into an infant's vein.
TPN is a major benefit for babies who cannot get nutrition in other ways.
Infants who receive TPN will be closely monitored by the health care team.
